dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 4380 IH: To rename the portion of United States Highway 75 between President George Bush Turnpike and United States Highway 380 as the “U.S. Congressman and Prisoner of War Sam Johnson Memorial Highway”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Self introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To rename the portion of United States Highway 75 between President George Bush Turnpike and United States Highway 380 as the U.S. Congressman and Prisoner of War Sam Johnson Memorial Highway.

section.header: Designation of U.S. Congressman and Prisoner of War Sam Johnson Memorial Highway

subsection.text: The portion of United States Highway 75 between President George Bush Turnpike and United States Highway 380 currently designated as Sam Johnson Highway, shall, after the date of enactment of this Act, be known and designated as the U.S. Congressman and Prisoner of War Sam Johnson Memorial Highway.

Any reference in any law, regulation, map, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the portion of the highway referred to in subsection (a) shall be considered to be a reference to the U.S. Congressman and Prisoner of War Sam Johnson Memorial Highway.
